text: I am new to HubL. Is there a way to use it to access custom object fields directly or do I have to go through the API for it? Sorry, I am a little confused about it.
Hi, nice to meet you all, how can i make a similar sentence SQL with %like% in HUBL?
You can do this and a bunch more using <http://sequin.io|Sequin> :slightly_smiling_face:
